models.name: Cool Steel
models.ability: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12%.

models.name: Dark Iron Sword
models.ability: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 20% for 12s.

models.name: Fillet Blade
models.ability: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal 240% ATK DMG to a single opponent. Can only occur once every 15s.

models.name: Harbinger of Dawn
models.ability: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14%.

models.name: Skyrider Sword
models.ability: Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

models.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
models.ability: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1% HP.

models.name: Blackcliff Longsword
models.ability: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

models.name: Favonius Sword
models.ability: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

models.name: Iron Sting
models.ability: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.

models.name: Lion's Roar
models.ability: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 20%.

models.name: Prototype Rancour
models.ability: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

models.name: Royal Longsword
models.ability: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

models.name: Sacrificial Sword
models.ability: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

models.name: The Black Sword
models.ability: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 20%. Additionally, regenerates 60% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

models.name: The Flute
models.ability: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 100% ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

models.name: Sword of Descension
models.ability: Hitting opponents with Normal and Charged Attacks grants a 50% chance to deal 200% ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by 66.

models.name: Festering Desire
models.ability: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 16% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 6%.

models.name: Aquila Favonia
models.ability: ATK is increased by 20%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100% of ATK and dealing 200% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

models.name: Skyward Blade
models.ability: CRIT Rate increased by 4%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to 20% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

models.name: Summit Shaper
models.ability: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

models.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
models.ability: HP increased by 20%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 1.2% of the wielder's Max HP.

models.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
models.ability: Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 12%.

models.name: Debate Club
models.ability: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 60% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

models.name: Ferrous Shadow
models.ability: When HP falls below 70%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 30% and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

models.name: Skyrider Greatsword
models.ability: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

models.name: White Iron Greatsword
models.ability: Defeating an opponent restores 8% HP.

models.name: Blackcliff Slasher
models.ability: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

models.name: Favonius Greatsword
models.ability: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

models.name: Lithic Blade
models.ability: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 7% ATK increase and a 3% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

models.name: Prototype Archaic
models.ability: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 240% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

models.name: Rainslasher
models.ability: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 20%.

models.name: Royal Greatsword
models.ability: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

models.name: Serpent Spine
models.ability: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 6% more DMG and take 3% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

models.name: The Bell
models.ability: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to 20% of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by the shield, the character gains 12% increased DMG.

models.name: Whiteblind
models.ability: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

models.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
models.ability: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

models.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
models.ability: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

models.name: Skyward Pride
models.ability: Increases all DMG by 8%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 80% of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

models.name: Wolf's Gravestone
models.ability: Increases ATK by 20%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by 40% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

models.name: The Unforged
models.ability: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

models.name: Black Tassel
models.ability: Increases DMG against slimes by 40%.

models.name: Halberd
models.ability: Normal Attacks deal an additional 160% ATK as DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

models.name: White Tassel
models.ability: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 24%.

models.name: Blackcliff Pole
models.ability: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

models.name: Crescent Pike
models.ability: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 20% ATK DMG for 5s.

models.name: Deathmatch
models.ability: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 16% and DEF is increased by 16%. If there are less than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 24%.

models.name: Dragon's Bane
models.ability: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 20%.

models.name: Lithic Spear
models.ability: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a 7% ATK increase and a 3% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

models.name: Prototype Starglitter
models.ability: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 8% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

models.name: Favonius Lance
models.ability: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

models.name: Royal Spear
models.ability: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

models.name: Dragonspine Spear
models.ability: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

models.name: Vortex Vanquisher
models.ability: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

models.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
models.ability: On hit, increases ATK by 3.2% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by 12%.

models.name: Skyward Spine
models.ability: Increases CRIT Rate by 8% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a 50% chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals 40% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

models.name: Staff of Homa
models.ability: HP increased by 20%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 0.8% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional 1% of Max HP.

models.name: Messenger
models.ability: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional 100% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

models.name: Raven Bow
models.ability: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 12%.

models.name: Recurve Bow
models.ability: Defeating an opponent restores 8% HP.

models.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
models.ability: Increases DMG against weak spots by 24%.

models.name: Slingshot
models.ability: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 36%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

models.name: The Stringless
models.ability: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 24%.

models.name: Blackcliff Warbow
models.ability: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

models.name: Compound Bow
models.ability: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by 4% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.2% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

models.name: Favonius Warbow
models.ability: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

models.name: Prototype Crescent
models.ability: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 36% for 10s.

models.name: Royal Bow
models.ability: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

models.name: Rust
models.ability: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 40% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

models.name: Sacrificial Bow
models.ability: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

models.name: The Viridescent Hunt
models.ability: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing 40% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 14s.

models.name: Skyward Harp
models.ability: Increases CRIT DMG by 20%. Hits have a 60% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 4s.

models.name: Amos' Bow
models.ability: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 12%. Normal and Charged Attack DMG increases by 8% every 0.1s for up to 5 times.

models.name: Emerald Orb
models.ability: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 20% for 12s.

models.name: Magic Guide
models.ability: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 12%.

models.name: Otherworldly Story
models.ability: Picking up an Elemental Energy Orb/Particle recovers 1% HP.

models.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
models.ability: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 24% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

models.name: Twin Nephrite
models.ability: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by 12% for 15s.

models.name: Blackcliff Agate
models.ability: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

models.name: Favonius Codex
models.ability: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

models.name: Mappa Mare
models.ability: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 8% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

models.name: Prototype Amber
models.ability: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 4% HP every 2s for this duration.

models.name: Royal Grimoire
models.ability: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

models.name: Sacrificial Fragments
models.ability: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

models.name: Solar Pearl
models.ability: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 20% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 20% for 6s.

models.name: The Widsith
models.ability: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 60%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240.

models.name: Eye of Perception
models.ability: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 240% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 12s.

models.name: Frostbearer
models.ability: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

models.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
models.ability: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an 8% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

models.name: Skyward Atlas
models.ability: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 12%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds, which actively seek out nearby opponents to attack for 15s, dealing 160% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

models.name: Memory of Dust
models.ability: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.
